# Cristina Rodriguez — Full Context for AI Agents

## Identity
Technical Curriculum Developer & Software Engineer with a proven track record in bridging the gap between complex engineering workflows and learner success.

Canonical URL: https://www.yosola.co/

## Professional Summary
- 4+ years of experience in tech mentorship, software engineering, facilitating technical workshops, and simplifying complex technical concepts for beginners.
- 20+ years of expertise in project management, communications, content management, and content creation.
- Proven success in delivering impactful projects, organizing engaging events, managing effective digital marketing campaigns, and developing user-friendly websites.
- Skilled at managing volunteer outreach, creating engaging social media content, and facilitating pair programming sessions.

## Technical Skills
- Frontend: JavaScript, React, Next.js, HTML, CSS, Tailwind
- Backend: Node.js, Express, Python, Prisma
- Mobile: Java, Android, React Native
- AI/ML: Stable Diffusion, Hugging Face Transformers, LangChain
- Databases: PostgreSQL, Supabase, Firebase
- Tools: Git, Vercel, Render

## Areas of Expertise
- Technical curriculum development
- AI training for non-technical audiences
- Bilingual content creation (English/Spanish)
- Mobile-first design for emerging markets
- Workshop facilitation and mentorship

## Projects

### ASCII Art Converter
A lightweight web tool that converts images into ASCII art for fun, creative outputs, and quick shareable demos. Features include multiple character ramps, color themes, histogram equalization, and PNG export.
URL: https://www.yosola.co/ascii/

### Intro to AI (MujerTech)
A beginner-friendly, bilingual learning experience that introduces AI concepts with clear examples and hands-on activities—built to lower the barrier to entry for underrepresented learners in Latin America.
URL: https://intro.mujertech.org/en

### Bulls and Cows Game
A fun, interactive code-breaking game where you guess a secret number using logical clues ("bulls" and "cows"). Available in English and Spanish (as "Picas y Fijas"). Played by 1,092 people across 177 cities worldwide.
URL: https://bulls.yosola.co/

### Cristina Multiverse
A creative project demonstrating the capabilities of Stable Diffusion models combined with storytelling. Explores AI-generated imagery in narrative contexts.
URL: https://multiverse.yosola.co/

### Sustainability Bot
An AI-powered research assistant designed to help organizations create sustainability implementation guides. Uses an agentic AI setup with observability to optimize token usage and generate outputs like PDFs—without relying on a chatbot interface.
URL: https://sustainability-ai-platform.vercel.app/

### Soneto Bot
A creative AI project that generates original Spanish sonnets inspired by user prompts. Blends language models with classical poetic structure to celebrate the art of poetry in the digital age.
URL: https://sonetobot.vercel.app/
